title: Duke Ludovico
body:
# Duke Ludovico

**Type:** Person
**Confidence:** 70%

## Summary

A historical figure referenced in the context of the loss of Milan by France. A duke referenced in relation to his political actions and decisions during the time of Machiavelli. A Duke of Milan known for his political maneuvers and alliances during the Italian Wars.

## Attributes

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| context | His presence contributed to France losing Milan. |
| historical_context | Involved in the power dynamics of Italy |
| location | Milan |
| role | Duke of Milan |

## Source Mentions

> the mere appearance of such a person as Duke Ludovico on the frontier was sufficient to cause France to lose Milan
> I find nothing to blame, on the contrary, I feel bound, as I have done, to hold him up as an example to be imitated by all who by fortune and with the arms of others have risen to power.
